name: bradley-terry
description: This is intended to be a simple implementation of the [Bradley-Terry][1] model. Code is written for easy of readability and verifiability over performance.

scripts.build-gsheet:
esbuild gsheets-wrapper.ts --bundle --format=esm --legal-comments=inline --tree-shaking=false --outfile=dist/gsheets-wrapper.js
echo "Remember to edit esbuild comments for BRADLEYTERRY and BRADLEYTERRY_TABLE to remove the /*! so the docs work in gsheets"
